bacci.giovanni.bio.sequencing

Class RandomFastaSequenceStreamer

  • java.lang.Object
    • bacci.giovanni.bio.sequencing.RandomFastaSequenceStreamer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SequenceStreamer

    public class RandomFastaSequenceStreamer
extends Object
implements SequenceStreamer
    Object that streams a Fasta sequence file and call the SequencePullStreamer.pull(String, Object...) method every time that it finds a sequence. This class will pass 2 additional args to the pull method:
    1) A long that is the pointer of the sequence in the RandomAccessFile
    2) The RandomAccessFile that points to the sequence
    3) A tag for the sequences as a String
    Author:
    Giovanni Bacci
